itemDescription: English rugby union and rugby league footballer

wikipedia_page.main: Thomas "Tom" Brown is an English former professional rugby union and rugby league footballer who played in the 2000s and 2010s, and has coached rugby union in the 2010s. He has played representative level rugby union (RU) for Wales (Under-21s), and at club level for Coventry R.F.C., Worcester Warriors, Newbury RFC, London Welsh, Cardiff Blues, Newport Gwent Dragons and Jersey as a number eight, and representative level rugby league (RL) for Wales, and at club level for Gloucestershire Warriors, as a second-row.
